_header: To thy neighbor for love of me
_description: John Audelay, a poem on the Nine Virtues — 102 lines in 13-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
To þi neȝbour fore loue of meTo make debate ny
                    dyscorde…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Prayes for me þat beþ presentMy name hyt ys þe
                    blynde Awdelay
BodDou302.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard. 
             The Poems of John Audelay.
Percy Society
         14. London: Richards, 1844: 51-4.
